mapper.select: SELECT rod.order_id,rod.product_id AS product_id,ol.order_totalpayment AS order_totalpayment, ol.payment_method AS payment_method,ol.order_date AS order_date,pr.product_name AS product_name, ol.order_state AS order_state,ol.receiver AS receiver FROM regular_orderdetail rod INNER JOIN order_list ol ON rod.order_id = ol.order_id INNER JOIN product pr ON rod.product_id = pr.product_id WHERE ol.member_index = #{member_index} ORDER BY rod.regular_orderdetail_id desc
